sense.gloss: to be extravagant, to live luxuriously
to be proud, to be haughty
defeat is inevitable for an overconfident army, being arrogant and overconfident inevitably leads to defeat, pride comes before a fall

k_ele.e: おごる平家久しからず

r_ele.r: おごるへいけひさしからず

sense.gloss: pride goes before a fall, pride comes before a fall, the proud Heike family does not last long

k_ele.e: 驕る平家は久しからず
奢る平家は久しからず
おごる平家は久しからず

r_ele.r: おごるへいけはひさしからず

sense.gloss: pride goes before a fall, pride comes before a fall, the proud Heike family does not last long
x: 奢る平家久しからず・おごるへいけひさしからず

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑実力↑↓じつりょく↓なら↑楽勝↑↓らくしょう↓だとは↑思↑↓おも↓うが、それに↑驕↑↓おご↓らず、まずはクラスのみんなと↑切磋琢磨↑↓せっさたくま↓していって↑欲↑↓ほ↓しい。
sdata.e: With your ability it should be a doddle, but please don't be prideful of that but first apply yourself dilligently with everyone in your class.

sdata.j: ↑驕傲↑↓きょうごう↓は↑人間↑↓にんげん↓の↑弱↑↓よわ↓さである。
